segments.text: Is this the class to prepare for interviews ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is the right place . Please join us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have an interview tomorrow , so I hope I can learn everything quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are all going to have great interviews . What are some things that we need to remember in an interview ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that we should make sure that our looks are the best they can be .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right , and what about our friendliness and attitude ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and being friendly and having a good attitude also help me relax .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you know that they pay as much attention to what you ask as to what you say in an interview ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn â€™ t . What else should I keep in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just relax , listen carefully to the questions , and be honest in your responses .
segments.speaker: S2
